byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Albuquerque and Jonathan Martin from Raleigh, N.C. Thomas Kaplan, Giovanni Russonello and Jennifer Steinhauer contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and JONATHAN MARTIN

abstract: Donald Trump mounts blistering attack against New Mexico's Republican Gov Susana Martinez during campaign rally in state; Trump must win over Hispanics and women, but his comments about Martinez, who is most prominent Hispanic woman in American politics, suggests he is more intent on proving that he will attack those who oppose him.
lead_paragraph: “It’s your governor’s fault,” Donald J. Trump told supporters at a rally in New Mexico. “We have to get your governor and get going. She’s got to do a better job, O.K.?”

headline.main: Donald Trump Gives Gov. Susana Martinez a Poor Performance Review
headline.print_headline: Trump Takes a Female, Hispanic Governor to Task

snippet: “It’s your governor’s fault,” Donald J. Trump told supporters at a rally in New Mexico. “We have to get your governor and get going. She’s got to do a better job, O.K.?”
